# [Process Servers for the Department of Justice Canada (JUS) Ontario Regional Office (ORO)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25699/rfso%28en_0.pdf)
[**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25699/afr-form-%28en_0.pdf)
 
**Quarter:** Ontario Region

## Overview of Services
The Ontario Regional Office (ORO) of the Department of Justice Canada (JUS) seeks the services of Process Servers to deliver and file legal documents within the Province of Ontario in accordance with applicable legislation and Rules of Court.

## Services to Perform
* Pick-up, sort, issue, serve, and file various types of legal documents within the Province of Ontario
* Perform services on a "firm daily" basis and on an "as and when requested" basis
* Deliver and file documents in the tax courts, federal courts, Ontario courts, and the Immigration and Refugee Board

## Contract Parameters

* Province of Ontario
* Greater Toronto Area (GTA) defined by the City of Toronto and the regions of Halton, Peel, York, and Durham
* No travel and living expenses will be reimbursed for services performed within the GTA
* Travel and living expenses will be reimbursed for services performed outside the GTA

## Security Requirements
The contract involves security requirements that must be met. For additional information, consult Part 6, Security, Financial and Insurance Requirements.

## Standing Offer Period
* The Department of Justice Canada will issue Standing Offers on a Right of First Refusal Basis
* The Standing Offers will be valid from the date of issuance to March 31, 2025, inclusive
* The Offeror agrees to extend the Standing Offer for two (2) one-year periods
